document_data.mainbody:
Mirie was an Attendant of Grief in the House of Grief temple that hid the Cloister of Sombre Embrace in the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Mirie was a wood elven woman with light and freckled skin. She had blonde hair and green eyes. As an attendant and a clerk, she wore simple priestly tunic and carried a quarterstaff.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Mirie served the Mother Superior as one of her Attendant of Grief at the House of Grief. She welcomed guests and those searching for the temples services in achieving sweet oblivion from grief, pain, melancholy, or treachery. She directed guests to the ritual of Mapping of the Heart that determined the supplicants true thoughts and intentions.
